text: In any derivative proceeding in the right of a foreign corporation, the matters covered by this part shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction of incorporation of the foreign corporation, except for §§ 29-305.53, 29- 305.55, and 29-305.56.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

DC CODE § 29-305.57

Current through December 11, 2012
